title: 抖陰app store評分跌至兩星

replies.msg:
抄自Reddit :

Elvish Yadav(a yt-ber) makes a comedy skit/roast on tiktokers(mind you indian tiktok is pretty cringe and shit), few tiktokers get mad but one - Amir Siddique gets like super mad , he then makes a igtv video acting all self righteous and calls out youtubers for "stealing their content" , how tiktok has "better user engagement" , and how brands are more "interested in tiktok" , and claims that he could content copystrike these indian youtubers, and in general says shit about the Indian YouTube scene , like how most youtubers don't go well together and stuff like that, now this guy Amir Siddiqui tagged multiple big Indian youtubers in his igtv video, one of them was Carryminati (he's probably the most famous 'roaster') he roasts Amir, calls out his shit, talks how tiktokers don't have much individual value, and brands sponsor them in bunches, this triggers Amir, then he mobilises his "fan base"(mind you he has one) to mass report Carryminati's video , which caused the video to be taken down by youtube, also there's speculation that he complained to LGBTQ+ community , calling out Carryminati ,saying he's disrespecting them(carry used certain words which are derogatory towards LGBTQ+ , BUT they had a proper context ,like pewds songs against T-Series ), this just sent all of this off the roof, and now everyone's mass reporting and 1 star review bombing tiktok on the playstore.
香港人唔喺唔去幫手啊？快啲去app store負皮啦
依單係印度人出手
